summary: This is an email forwarding Judge Alison Nathan's opinion on Ghislaine Maxwell's pretrial motions. The opinion grants the motion to sever perjury counts but denies most other motions, while deferring decision on suppression motions regarding Boies Schiller materials.

persons.name: Judge Alison Nathan
persons.context: Issued the opinion on Ghislaine Maxwell's pretrial motions, granting severance of perjury counts but denying most other motions.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the pretrial motions opinion; her motion to sever perjury counts was granted while other motions were denied.

connections.description: Judge Nathan issued a ruling on Maxwell's pretrial motions in her criminal case.

events.title: Judge Nathan's Opinion on Maxwell Motions
events.description: Judge Alison Nathan issued an opinion on Ghislaine Maxwell's pretrial motions, granting severance of perjury counts but denying most other motions.

keyFacts: Judge Alison Nathan granted Ghislaine Maxwell's motion to sever the perjury counts from her other charges.
Judge Nathan denied the majority of Maxwell's other pretrial motions.
The suppression motions regarding materials from Boies Schiller were not addressed in this opinion and will be decided separately.
